Summary: cover-up obvious- on basically a nightly basis
divs: Sighting Detailsvortex's opening up in the skies on a practically a nightly basis.helicopter's chasing strange objects consistently.things are becoming more obvious with regularity above us.stars that aren't actually stars when you watch closely and patiently.yellowish-white headlights on front of craft patroling skies,especially from sunset to about two hours afterwards.these are in fact peak times for letting out the smaller scout crafts with the blinking crisp red and white lights.chemtrails have been constantly sprayed here lately to hide the consistant movements and patterns of these extra-dimensional objects.objects lately have included huge rectangular crafts 350 feet long and 80 feet wide moving north-east to south-west.also a huge cylinder craft moving basically north-east to south-west also.does this have any correlation to the many sitings as of late in texas?investigation will be necessary soon.i will buy and begin filming soon with an above average camcorder.thank you for your time!
